messages.id: Alternative url path must start with a slash.
messages.defaultMessage: Alternative URL path must start with a slash.

messages.id: Enter the absolute path where the alternative url should exist. The path must start with '/'. Only URLs that result in a 404 not found page will result in a redirect occurring.
messages.defaultMessage: Enter the absolute path where the alternative URL should exist. The path must start with '/'. Only URLs that result in a 404 not found page will result in a redirect occurring.

messages.id: Enter the absolute path of the target. Target must exist or be an existing alternative url path to the target.
messages.defaultMessage: Enter the absolute path of the target. Target must exist or be an existing alternative URL path to the target.

Add many alternative URLs at once by uploading a CSV file. The first column should be the path to redirect from; the second, the path to redirect to. Both paths must be Plone-site-relative, starting with a slash (/). An optional third column can contain a date and time. An optional fourth column can contain a boolean to mark as a manual redirect (default true).

messages.id: All existing alternative urls for this site
messages.defaultMessage: Existing alternative URLs for this site

messages.defaultMessage: Alternative URL path  target URL path (date and time of creation, manually created yes/no)
